translation: translated by imperial edict of the Tripiṭaka Master Prajñāpāramitā of Kāśmīra

source_sentence: 入不思議解脫境界普賢行願品
translation: Chapter on the Vows and Practices of Samantabhadra who Enters the Realm of Inconceivable Liberation

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子隨順思惟，一心專念彼諸菩薩微妙辯才莊嚴法門，一心專念彼諸菩薩言辭教海，
translation: Then Sudhana paid his respects to those enlightening beings and remembered the ocean of their discourses, saying, “Enlightening beings are like this:

source_sentence: 一心專念彼諸菩薩微細方便，一心專念彼諸菩薩清淨解脫，一心專念彼諸菩薩善根光明，
translation: With one mind concentrating on the subtle techniques of those enlightening beings, with another mind concentrating on the pure liberation of those enlightening beings, with another mind concentrating on the light of the roots of goodness of those enlightening being

source_sentence: 一心專念彼諸菩薩清淨善巧，一心專念彼諸菩薩攝眾生智，一心專念彼諸菩薩廣大智力，
translation: “Great enlightening beings concentrate their minds on the purity and skillfulness of those enlightening beings, concentrate their minds on the empowerment of sentient beings by those enlightening beings, and concentrate their mind

source_sentence: 一心專念彼諸菩薩勇猛不退，一心專念彼諸菩薩殊勝志樂，一心專念彼諸菩薩無量功德，
translation: “Great enlightening beings concentrate their minds on those enlightening beings’ boundless virtues. They concentrate their minds on the supreme aspirations of those enlightening beings, and they concentrate their minds on the infinit

source_sentence: 一心專念彼諸菩薩無礙法門。
translation: With one mind, he focuses his attention on the unobstructed dharmas of those bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 如是思惟，弘誓堅固，勇猛精進而為甲冑，以正信力恒自莊嚴，勤求正法，
translation: In the midst of this contemplation, they make great vows and firmly undertake them. With boldness and energy they form their armor; through the power of right faith they always adorn themselves and diligently seek the true teaching.

source_sentence: 心無疲厭；
translation: Their minds are not weary.

source_sentence: 志願堅固，猶若金剛及那羅延，無能壞者；
translation: Their resolve is as strong as that of a diamond or an ounce of gold, and there is no one who can break it.

source_sentence: 恒於一切善知識教，奉順修行常無間斷；
translation: They always follow and practice the teachings of all good teachers, always without interruption.

source_sentence: 於諸境界，心無染著，普門妙行，皆悉現前，普眼智光，照諸法海，圓滿諸地陀羅尼門，
translation: Their minds were unattached to objects, their practices universally endowed with subtle deeds; the light of knowledge of omniscience illumined the ocean of all truths. They perfected the doors of concentration spells and spells

source_sentence: 現見十方，了法邊際。
translation: They now see the ten directions and understand the limits of the teaching.

source_sentence: 以無礙智普遍莊嚴，證解清淨無依法性，顯示無對無二法門，超過一切最勝彼岸，
translation: Universally adorned by unhindered knowledge, they realize and understand the pure, non-dharmaless nature of all things. They show the faceless, nondual teaching that transcends all obstacles to enlightenment.

source_sentence: 入淨智門，永離諸想；
translation: They enter the door of pure knowledge and are forever free from all conceptions.

source_sentence: 能審觀察諸法實際，普知三世差別法門，普往十方差別世界，普見十方差別佛身，
translation: They can examine and observe the reality of all things; they know the differentiated teachings of past, present, and future. Going to the differentiated worlds of the ten directions, they see everywhere the differentiated buddha-bodies of the ten directions.

source_sentence: 普入十方差別時劫，普觀十方差別業性，普轉諸佛差別法輪，普智三昧明照其心，
translation: He entered into all the different eons of time in the ten directions, observed the different natures of actions in the ten directions, universally turned the wheel of teaching differentiating buddhas, and his concentration of universal knowledge illumined his mind.

source_sentence: 心恒普入平等境界。
translation: The mind always enters universally into the sphere of equality.

source_sentence: 如來慧光照觸其身，一切智流相續不斷；
translation: When the light of knowledge of buddhas illumines their bodies, all streams of knowledge continue unceasingly.

source_sentence: 若身若心勢力自在，常不捨離一切佛法。
translation: Whether body or mind, their power and momentum are unimpeded, they always don't abandon all the Buddha's teachings.

source_sentence: 以深信力，常得諸佛威神所加；
translation: By the power of deep faith they always attain the empowerment of buddhas.

source_sentence: 以淨慧力，為諸如來光明所照；
translation: By the power of pure wisdom they are illumined by the light of enlightened ones.

source_sentence: 以誓願力，願身周遍一切剎網，一切法界，普入其身。
translation: By the power of his vow, his body of vows pervades all networks of worlds, and all realms of reality enter his body.

source_sentence: 漸次遊行，經十二年至住林城，周遍詢求解脫長者。
translation: After twelve years of traveling gradually, he came to live in the forested city and pervaded it with the elders seeking liberation.

source_sentence: 既得見已，五體投地，頂禮雙足，起立合掌，白言：「聖者！
translation: When he saw them, he prostrated himself with his five bodies to the ground, bowed his head at their feet, stood up and joined his palms, and said, Sage!

source_sentence: 我今得與善知識會，是我獲得廣大善利。
translation: Now that I've been able to meet with a good teacher, I've attained vast and good benefits.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 善知識者難可出現，難得聞名，難得逢值，難得親近，難得承接，難得同住，
translation: Good friends are difficult to appear, difficult to name, difficult to meet, difficult to associate with, difficult to receive, and difficult to live together.

source_sentence: 難得奉事，難令喜悅，難蒙開曉，難得隨逐。
translation: It's difficult to serve, difficult to please, difficult to awaken, and difficult to follow.

source_sentence: 我今會遇真善知識，是我獲得最勝善利，如是展轉難中之難。
translation: Now that I've met a truly good teacher, I've attained the most excellent and good rewards, and so forth, which are difficult and difficult to overcome.

source_sentence: 「聖者！
translation: “Noble one!

source_sentence: 我已先發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，為欲值遇一切佛興故，為欲普聞一切佛名故，
translation: I have set my mind on unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, wanting to meet all buddhas and hear the names of all buddhas.

source_sentence: 為欲普見一切佛身故，為欲普詣一切佛剎故，為欲普入一切佛會故，為欲普觀一切佛境故，
translation: Because they want to see all buddha-bodies, because they want to go to all buddha-lands, because they want to enter the assembly of all buddhas, and because they want to pervade the realm of all buddhas.

source_sentence: 為欲普知一切佛意故，為欲普受一切佛記故，為欲普承一切佛力故，為欲普事一切諸佛故，
translation: Because they want to know the minds of all buddhas; because they want to receive the predictions of all buddhas; because they want to inherit the power of all buddhas; because they want to serve all buddhas.

source_sentence: 為欲證悟一切佛法故，為欲隨順一切佛心故，為欲圓滿一切佛願故，為欲獲得一切三昧故，
translation: Because they want to realize all buddha-teachings, because they want to follow the minds of all buddhas, because they want to fulfill the vows of all buddhas, and because they want to attain all concentrations.

source_sentence: 為欲照明一切佛智故，為欲莊嚴一切佛會故，為欲遍修諸佛本行故，為欲現見諸佛神通故，
translation: Because they want to illumine the knowledge of all buddhas, because they want to adorn the assemblies of all buddhas, because they want to cultivate the original practices of enlightenment everywhere, and because they want to manifest the spiritual powers of

source_sentence: 為欲具證諸佛智力故，為欲清淨諸佛無畏故，為欲聽聞一切佛法故，為欲受持諸佛法輪故，
translation: Because they want to realize the power of knowledge of Buddhas, because they want to purify the fearlessness of buddhas, because they want to hear all the teachings of buddhas, and because they want to receive and uphold the teachings of buddhas.

source_sentence: 為欲辨析一切佛法故，為欲住持諸佛教海故，為欲守護諸佛法城故，為欲觀察佛所覺法故，
translation: Because they want to analyze all Buddha teachings, because they want to preserve the ocean of enlightenment teachings, because they want to protect the city of truth of buddhas, and because they want to contemplate the principles realized by buddhas.

source_sentence: 為欲解悟佛所證法故，為欲深入佛所知法故，為欲見一切佛法於自身中出生故，
translation: Because they want to understand and awaken to the teaching realized by Buddha; because they want to enter deeply into the teaching known by Buddha; because they want to see all buddha-teachings emanate within themselves.

source_sentence: 為欲與一切菩薩同體故，為欲與一切菩薩同類故，為欲等一切菩薩善根故，
translation: Because they want to be the same as all enlightening beings, because they want to be the same in essence as all enlightening beings, because they want to be of the same type as all enlightening beings, and because they want to equal all

source_sentence: 為欲觀一切菩薩所學故，為欲同一切菩薩淨行故，為欲成一切菩薩所修故，
translation: Because they want to observe all the learnings of enlightening beings, because they want to be equal to the pure practices of all enlightening beings, and because they want to fulfill the practices of all enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 為欲滿一切菩薩波羅蜜故，為欲發一切菩薩清淨願故，為欲入一切菩薩大願海故，
translation: Because they want to fulfill all the transcendent ways of enlightening beings, because they want to give rise to the pure vows of all enlightening beings, and because they want to enter the ocean of great vows of all enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 為欲具一切菩薩大悲力故，為欲至一切菩薩究竟處故，為欲獲得諸佛菩薩差別威神藏故，
translation: Because they want to embody the power of great compassion of all enlightening beings, and because they want to reach the ultimate sphere of omniscience of all enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 為欲獲得一切菩薩智慧光明無盡藏故，為欲獲得一切菩薩廣大功德三昧藏故，
translation: Because they want to attain the inexhaustible treasury of the light of knowledge of all enlightening beings, and because they want to attain the vast store of concentration of virtue of all enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 為欲獲得一切菩薩無量威力藏故，為欲獲得一切菩薩無量神通藏故，為欲獲得一切菩薩大神變藏無窮盡故，
translation: Because they want to attain the immeasurable store of powers of all enlightening beings; because they want to attain the immeasurable store of mystic knowledge of all enlightening beings; and because they want to attain the inex

source_sentence: 為欲獲得一切菩薩大自在藏常現前故，為欲獲得一切菩薩淨妙色藏而莊嚴故，
translation: Because they want to attain the great store of mastery of all enlightening beings, always appearing before them; because they want to attain the adornment of the store of pure and beautiful forms of all enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 為欲獲得一切菩薩大慈悲藏，教化眾生皆令究竟達彼岸故。
translation: It's because they want to attain the great store of compassion for all bodhisattvas and teach sentient beings so that they will ultimately reach the other shore.

source_sentence: 「聖者！
translation: “Noble one!

source_sentence: 我今以如是心，如是意樂，如是希欲，如是勤求，如是思惟，如是渴仰，
translation: “With such thoughts, such intentions, such desires, such endeavors, such efforts, such thoughts, and such aspirations,

source_sentence: 如是尊重，如是方便，如是勇猛，如是究竟，如是謙下，來至聖者善知識所。
translation: Thus honored, thus skillful, thus courageous, thus accomplished, and thus humble, they come to the place of the noble one who is a good teacher.

source_sentence: 我聞聖者善能誘誨諸菩薩眾，能以方便開佛境界，示其道路，指其津濟，
translation: I have heard that the holy one is skilled in guiding and advising enlightening beings. He can, by means of skillful means, reveal the sphere of buddhahood to them, show them the path, and point out their rescue

source_sentence: 與其橋梁，授其船筏。
translation: He gave it to the bridge and gave it to the raft.

source_sentence: 普令一切截愚癡網，除顛倒障，拔疑惑箭，滌煩惱垢，照心稠林，破心迷執，
translation: They cause all to cut off the web of ignorance, remove the obstacle of delusion, pull out the arrow of doubt, wash away the stain of afflictions, illumine the dense forest of mind, and break through the convictions of

source_sentence: 令心潔白，正心諂曲，除心熱惱，使心清涼，迴生死流，趣涅槃道，令心遠離諸見牢獄，
translation: He causes his mind to be pure and white, his mind to be correct and flattering, his mind to be free of feverish agitation, his mind to be clear and cool, to turn back the course of birth and death, and proceed toward the path of nir

source_sentence: 令心解脫貪欲繫縛於染愛處，令心動轉隨順趣入一切智性，令其疾到廣大法城，
translation: They cause the mind to be liberated from the bondage of craving and clinging to defiled states. They cause the mind to develop in accord with all directions and enter the nature of omniscience. They cause it to quickly reach the great city of truth.

source_sentence: 令其堅固無上大悲，令其安住究竟大慈，令其發起諸菩薩行，令其修習諸三昧門，
translation: “Great enlightening beings develop great compassion, great benevolence, great love, and great compassion; they attain the practice of enlightening beings. They become firm in unexcelled compassion, abide in ultimate kindness,

source_sentence: 令其悟入聖所證位，令其觀察諸法本性，令其增長普賢願力，於諸眾生其心平等。
translation: They cause them to awaken and enter the state realized by the sages, cause them to examine the original nature of all dharmas, cause them to increase the power of the vow of universal goodness, and make their minds equal to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 唯願慈哀，為我宣說菩薩云何學菩薩行、修菩薩道，隨所修習疾得清淨，
translation: Please have mercy on me and show me how an enlightening being is to learn and carry out the practice of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 疾得明了，具足圓滿。」
translation: They'll quickly attain clarity and complete completion.

source_sentence: 時，解脫長者以過去積集善根力故，如來現在威神力故，文殊師利童子憶念力故，
translation: Then the householder liberated, because of the power of accumulating roots of goodness he had accumulated in the past, because of the spiritual power of the present presence of the Buddha, and because of the power of recollection of MaiijusIi.

source_sentence: 十方一切諸善知識本行願力所加持故，即入菩薩勝三昧門，其三昧名普攝無邊一切佛剎旋陀羅尼。
translation: Because it's supported by the power of the vows of the original practices of all good teachers in the ten directions, he then enters the bodhisattva's superior approach to concentration, which is called the dhāraṇī of universally collecting

source_sentence: 入三昧已，其身清淨，光明映徹，於其身中，顯現十方各十佛剎極微塵數佛及佛剎淨妙莊嚴眾會道場光明等事；
translation: Having entered concentration, his body became pure and shining like a ray of light. In his body he manifested buddhas as numerous as atoms in ten buddha-lands in the ten directions, adorned with arrays of purity and splendors equal to

source_sentence: 亦現彼佛往昔同行諸菩薩眾，往昔所現神通變化，往昔所發廣大誓願，
translation: It also manifested the spiritual powers and mystic displays of those buddhas’ past companions, as well as the great vows they had undertaken in the past.

source_sentence: 往昔所修助道之法，往昔所淨諸出離道，往昔所有清淨莊嚴，往昔所修諸菩薩行；
translation: The aids to enlightenment cultivated in the past, the paths of liberation purified in the past, the pure adornments of the past, and the practices of enlightening beings cultivated in the past.

source_sentence: 亦見彼佛成等正覺轉妙法輪，教化眾生；
translation: They also saw those buddhas attain perfect enlightenment and turn the wheel of the fine teaching, edifying sentient beings.

source_sentence: 如是一切悉於身中分明顯現無有障礙。
translation: All of these things are clearly manifested in the body without any obstruction.

source_sentence: 亦於身內一切剎中普現其身，無不充遍；
translation: He also manifested his body in all the buddha-lands within his body, filling them without fail.

source_sentence: 身與佛剎互相涉入不相障礙，種種色像而無往來，一一差別次第而住，
translation: Their bodies and buddha-lands are mutually inclusive, unobstructed by each other. They have various forms without going or coming, abiding one by one in order of distinction.

source_sentence: 不相雜亂。
translation: They aren't mixed up with each other.

source_sentence: 所謂：種種佛剎各別莊嚴，種種眾會眷屬圓滿，種種威儀恭敬供養，種種道場各各嚴飾。
translation: They are various buddha-lands each adorned, various congregations and retinues filled, various manners respected and offered support, various sites of enlightenment each adorned.

source_sentence: 其中諸佛示現種種遊戲神通，建立種種差別乘道，顯示種種廣大願門，
translation: The buddhas of that assembly manifested various playful spiritual powers, established various different paths of enlightenment, and displayed various vast vows.

source_sentence: 普遍莊嚴種種神力。
translation: He universally adorned himself with various miraculous powers.

source_sentence: 或一世界示現上生處兜率宮而作佛事；
translation: Perhaps a world does buddha-work manifesting the abode of enlightenment in the palace of Tuṣita Heaven.

source_sentence: 或一世界沒兜率天，下入王宮而作佛事；
translation: In some worlds they do buddha-work by descending into the heaven of satisfaction and entering the palace of kings.

source_sentence: 或現處胎種種神變；
translation: Sometimes they manifest various miraculous displays in the womb.

source_sentence: 或現誕生種種瑞相；
translation: Sometimes they manifest various auspicious signs of birth.

source_sentence: 或現嬰孩種種遊戲；
translation: Or they may show various plays of children.

source_sentence: 或示童子現處內宮；
translation: Or they may show the prince his presence in the inner palace.

source_sentence: 或現出家示行苦行；
translation: Or they may manifest renunciation and show austerities.

source_sentence: 或詣覺樹坐於道場；
translation: Or they may go to the tree of enlightenment and sit at the site of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 或現神通破魔軍眾；
translation: Sometimes they manifest mystical powers to destroy the armies of Māra.

source_sentence: 或現自在成無上道；
translation: Sometimes they manifest unimpeded attainment of the supreme path.

source_sentence: 或現諸王勸請說法；
translation: Or they may manifest kings encouraging and inviting them to teach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 或現受請轉妙法輪；
translation: Or they may now receive invitations to turn the wheel of the fine teaching.

source_sentence: 或現天、龍、乾闥婆等恭敬圍遶，常隨守護；
translation: Sometimes they appear to be surrounded by celestial beings, nāgas, and gandharvas.

source_sentence: 或現其身遍入諸趣；
translation: Sometimes they manifest their bodies entering all states of existence.

source_sentence: 或往一切眾生住處；
translation: Or they may go to all the dwelling places of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 或時示現度眾生已，入般涅槃，為令世間咸增戀慕；
translation: Sometimes they manifest entering nirvana after liberating sentient beings, to cause the world to increase in craving.

source_sentence: 或現舍利全身、碎身，分布人天，令興福祐；
translation: Sometimes they manifest relics with whole bodies or broken bodies, distributing them among humans and gods to bring forth blessedness.

source_sentence: 或遍人天起大塔廟，莊嚴國界，饒益眾生。
translation: Or they may pervade the human realm and build great stūpas and shrines, adorning their borders and benefiting sentient beings.

source_sentence: 彼諸如來於種種世界，種種趣生，種種部類，種種眾會，種種根器，種種樂欲，
translation: In various worlds, various destinies, various divisions, various assemblies, various faculties and vessels, various pleasures and desires:

source_sentence: 種種業行，種種信解，種種根力，種種修習，種種行願，種種覺悟，種種心想，
translation: They are various actions, various beliefs, various faculties, various powers, various practices, various undertakings, various vows, various enlightenments, and various thoughts.

source_sentence: 種種煩惱，隨眠習氣；
translation: The various defilements are the habit energy of proclivities and latencies.

source_sentence: 如是一切眾生海中，以佛威力廣現神通，遍一切處施作佛事。
translation: Thus, in the ocean of all sentient beings, he uses the Buddha's authoritative power to extensively manifest his miraculous abilities and perform buddha-works everywhere.

source_sentence: 所謂：或處極微塵量道場，或處無邊廣大道場，或處一由旬量道場，或處十由旬量道場，
translation: They may be at the site of enlightenment as numerous as atoms in the polar mountain, or they may be at the site of enlightenment as infinitely vast as space. Or they may be at the site of enlightenment as one yojana

source_sentence: 乃至或處與不可說不可說佛剎極微塵數諸世界海，其量正等眾會道場；
translation: In some places there are as many oceans of worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, the number of which is equal to the number of congregations and sites of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 以種種神通，種種音聲，種種言辭，種種辯才，種種訓釋，於諸如來聖諦海中，
translation: By means of various spiritual powers, various sounds, various expressions, various eloquence, and various explanations, they enter the ocean of truths of buddhas.

source_sentence: 以種種無畏大師子吼，為種種眾生演說種種修多羅海，開示種種陀羅尼門，
translation: With various kinds of fearless great lion’s roar he expounded to all kinds of sentient beings various oceans of scriptures and showed them various spells.

source_sentence: 普轉種種如來法輪，普授種種諸菩薩記。
translation: He universally turns the Dharma wheel of all kinds of buddhas, and he universally grants assurance to all kinds of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 彼諸如來所說法門，所出言音，善財童子悉能聽受，憶持不忘，思惟觀察；
translation: The words and sounds of the teachings expounded by those buddhas are heard, remembered, preserved, reflected, and observed by Sudhana.

source_sentence: 亦見諸佛及諸菩薩不可思議諸三昧門，自在神變。
translation: They also saw the inconceivable samādhis of buddhas and bodhisattvas, their unimpeded miraculous transformations.

source_sentence: 爾時，解脫長者現是相已，即從三昧安詳而起，告善財童子言：「善男子！
translation: After he showed these signs, the elderly liberated man rose from his concentration and said to Sudhana, Good sons!

source_sentence: 我已於此甚深無礙莊嚴解脫門自在入出。
translation: I've already entered and exited this profound, unobstructed, adorned liberation gate of liberation freely.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我住於此解脫門時，即見東方閻浮檀金光明世界，龍自在王如來、應、正等覺道場眾會之所圍遶，
translation: When I was staying at this door of liberation, I saw the golden-luminous world of Jambudvfpa in the east, surrounded by the assemblies of the buddha-field of enlightenment of the Tathāgata

source_sentence: 毘盧遮那藏菩薩而為上首；
translation: The foremost was the enlightening being Vairocanagarbha Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 又見南方速疾具足諸力世界，遍覆普香王如來、應、正等覺道場眾會之所圍遶，
translation: To the south I see all the worlds of myriad buddha-fields in the ten directions, with their arrays of fragrant arrays adorned with various jewels; to the south I see oceans of celestial and human beings everywhere

source_sentence: 思惟心王菩薩而為上首；
translation: The enlightening being Mind King of Meditation was the first and foremost.

source_sentence: 又見西方具足一切香圓滿光世界，須彌燈王如來、應、正等覺道場眾會之所圍遶，
translation: To the west I see a world of all kinds of fragrances and perfect light, surrounded by the congregations at the sites of enlightenment of buddhas such as Buddha, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, King of Illumination

source_sentence: 無礙心菩薩而為上首；
translation: Unobstructed-minded enlightening beings are the leaders.

source_sentence: 又見北方袈裟幢世界，金剛堅固如來、應、正等覺道場眾會之所圍遶，
translation: To the north I see in the world Saradhvaja Banner, surrounded by the assemblies at the enlightenment sites of Vajrapāṇi Tathāgata, Arhat, and Completely Enlightened One.

source_sentence: 金剛遊步勇猛行菩薩而為上首；
translation: The foremost was the enlightening being Traveling on a Path of Indestructible Diamond, led by Vairocana Buddha.

source_sentence: 又見東北方一切殊勝妙寶世界，無所得境界眼毘盧遮那如來、應、正等覺道場眾會之所圍遶，
translation: To the northeast, he saw all the worlds of great wonder and jewels surrounded by the assemblies at the enlightenment sites of Vairocana Buddha with his unobtainable sphere of vision.

source_sentence: 無所得妙變化菩薩而為上首；
translation: The foremost was the enlightening being Wonderful Transformation of the Ungraspable, led by Universally Good.

source_sentence: 又見東南方自在香焰光音世界，香燈王如來、應、正等覺道場眾會之所圍遶，
translation: To the southeast, to the world Independently Independent Fragrant Flame and Luminous Sound of the Southern Ocean, he saw the Tathāgata Sugandhakūṭa surrounded by the assemblies at the sites of enlightenment of buddhas

source_sentence: 金剛焰慧自在妙因王菩薩而為上首；
translation: The foremost was the enlightening being King of Wonderful Causes of Wisdom of adamantine Flame, led by Universally Good.

source_sentence: 又見西南方智日焰普光明世界，毘盧遮那普智聲如來、應、正等覺道場眾會之所圍遶，
translation: To the southwest was the world Universal Light of the Sun of Knowledge, surrounded by the assemblies at the site of enlightenment by the voice of universal knowledge emanating from Vairocana Buddha.

source_sentence: 普焰垂髻變現香華光菩薩而為上首；
translation: The foremost was the enlightening being Universal Flame Hanging Down from the Topknot, Producing Fragrant Flower Light.

source_sentence: 又見西北方普清淨妙香莊嚴藏世界，無量功德海幢圓滿光如來、應、正等覺道場眾會之所圍遶，
translation: To the northwest I see in the world Universally Pure Treasury of Arrays of Sublime Fragrance, surrounded by assemblies at the sites of enlightenment of buddhas such as Buddha, Arhat, Perfectly Enlighten

source_sentence: 無礙威力身智幢王菩薩而為上首；
translation: The foremost was the enlightening being Banner King of Knowledge of the Unobstructed Majestic Body, a bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 又見下方師子騰焰解脫光明世界，無礙法界幢具足智慧焰光如來、應、正等覺道場眾會之所圍遶，
translation: At the nadir he saw a world of light called “sphere of lion-light,” surrounded by buddhas and congregations at the sites of enlightenment, adorned with unobstructed banners of the cosmos of reality, illumined

source_sentence: 法界智焰光明遍照世界幢菩薩而為上首；
translation: The enlightening being Universal Illumination of the Flame of Knowledge of the cosmos of reality was the first.

source_sentence: 又見上方光明遍照次第出現無盡佛世界，名稱無邊無礙智慧圓滿光幢王如來、應、正等覺道場眾會之所圍遶，
translation: He also saw the buddha-world Inexhaustible, illumined by light from above, appearing in succession to infinitely many buddha-realms. His name was Boundless, boundless, unobstructed; he was surrounded

source_sentence: 無礙精進力法界智幢王菩薩而為上首。
translation: The Bodhisattva King of the Banner of Wisdom of the Dharma Realm with Unobstructed Energy is the supreme leader.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我見如是十佛世尊而為上首，如是乃至見於十方各十佛剎極微塵數諸佛如來、應、正等覺道場眾會之所圍遶，
translation: I see as many buddhas in the ten directions as atoms in ten buddha-lands, surrounded by assemblies of enlightening beings:

source_sentence: 一一皆有上首菩薩并諸眷屬，分明顯現；
translation: Each one of them had a supreme chief enlightening being and his retinues, clearly manifesting distinctively.

source_sentence: 然彼一切世界如來不來至此，我身亦不往詣於彼。
translation: Still, the Tathāgatas of all those worlds don't come here, and I myself don't go there.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我若欲見安樂世界無量壽如來，隨意即見；
translation: If I want to see the Buddha of Immeasurable Life in the world of peace and happiness, I can see him as I wish.

source_sentence: 我若欲見白栴檀香世界月智如來、妙香世界寶光明如來、蓮華世界寶蓮華光明如來、妙金光世界寂靜光如來、妙喜世界不動如來、善住世界師子相如來、鏡光明世界月覺如來、吉祥師子寶莊嚴世界毘盧遮那如來。
translation: If I want to see the Tathāgata of the moon wisdom in the white sandalwood world, the Tathāgata of the jeweled light in the marvelous fragrance world, the Tathāgata of the jeweled lotus light in the lotus

source_sentence: 如是十方一切世界所有如來，我若欲見，隨意即見；
translation: In the same way I see all these buddhas in all worlds of the ten directions, and if I want to see them, I can do so at will.

source_sentence: 然彼如來不來至此，我不往彼。
translation: But that Tathāgata doesn't come here, and I won't go there.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我若欲見盡過去際一切劫中，所有諸佛及彼佛剎種種莊嚴道場眾會，神通變化，
translation: “If I wish to see all the buddhas of past eons, as well as their various adornments and sites of enlightenment, mystical displays and manifestations,

source_sentence: 調伏眾生；
translation: They discipline sentient beings.

source_sentence: 盡未來際一切劫海，所有如來及諸菩薩莊嚴國土眾會道場，調伏眾生，
translation: To the end of all oceans of eons, throughout all future ages, there will be buddhas and enlightening beings everywhere, adorned with arrays of lands, assembled at sites of enlightenment, taming sentient beings.

source_sentence: 神通變化；
translation: miraculous transformations;

source_sentence: 如是一切隨念皆見。
translation: Thus, all of these are seen according to their thoughts.

source_sentence: 彼諸如來及彼諸劫，一切佛剎所有莊嚴，種種差別，不來至今，我心亦不入彼過、未；
translation: The various adornments of all those buddha-lands and the various distinctions in their embellishments, past, present, and future, I do not enter them into my mind.

source_sentence: 然其所見，皆如現在。
translation: What they see, however, is like the present.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我能了知十方三世一切如來及諸菩薩國土莊嚴、神通等事，無所從來亦無所去，
translation: “I can know the adornments, mystical powers, and other deeds of all buddhas and enlightening beings of past, present, and future in the ten directions without coming or going.

source_sentence: 無有行處亦無住處，亦知己身無去無來，無行住處。
translation: There's no place of practice and no place of abode, and they also know that their own body has no going or coming, and there's no place of practice or abode.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 知一切佛及與我心皆如夢故，如夢所見，從分別生。
translation: It's because they know that all buddhas and the mind of self are like dreams, just as what they see in a dream arises from discrimination.

source_sentence: 見一切佛從自心起，又知自心如器中水，悟解諸法如水中影；
translation: They see all buddhas emanate from their own minds, and know their own minds are like water in a pot. Enlightening beings understand all things are like reflections in the water.

source_sentence: 又知自心猶如幻術，知一切法如幻所作；
translation: They also know their own minds are like magic tricks, and they know all things are like illusions created by magic.

source_sentence: 又知自心諸佛菩薩悉皆如響，譬如空谷隨聲發響，悟解自心，隨念見佛，
translation: “Furthermore, they know that all the buddhas and enlightening beings of their own minds are like echoes.

source_sentence: 我如是知，如是憶念，所見諸佛皆由自心。
translation: I thus know and thus remember, and the buddhas I see all come from my own mind.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 當知菩薩修諸佛法，淨諸佛剎，積集妙行，調伏眾生，發大誓願，入一切智，
translation: You should know that enlightening beings cultivate all buddha-teachings, purify all buddha-lands, accumulate sublime practices, tame sentient beings, make great vows, and enter omniscience.

source_sentence: 自在遊戲不可思議解脫法門，得佛菩提，現大神通，遍往十方一切法界，
translation: They play freely through the teaching of inconceivable liberation and attain enlightenment, manifesting great mystic powers traveling to all universes in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 以微細智，普入諸劫，如是一切佛菩薩法，皆由自心。
translation: By means of subtle knowledge they enter all ages—all the teachings of buddhas and enlightening beings are based on their own minds.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 諸業虛妄，積集名心，末那思量，意識分別，眼等五識，了境不同。
translation: The actions are false, the accumulation of which is called mind, manas, volition, thinking consciousness, discrimination, and the five conscious constructs such as the eye that perceive objects differently.

source_sentence: 愚癡凡夫，不能覺知，怖老病死，求入涅槃；
translation: Foolish worldlings cannot recognize it. Fearing old age, sickness, and death, they seek to enter nirvana.

source_sentence: 生死涅槃二俱不識，於一切境妄起分別。
translation: Neither birth-and-death nor nirvāṇa are conscious, and they deludedly discriminate among all objects.

source_sentence: 又由未來諸根五塵境界斷滅，凡愚之人以為涅槃，諸佛菩薩自證悟時，
translation: It is also because in the future all their faculties will be destroyed by the five objects of sense perception. Ordinary and ignorant people take it as nirvana. When buddhas and bodhisattvas realize enlightenment for themselves,

source_sentence: 轉阿賴耶得本覺智。
translation: He turns the store and attains the originally enlightened knowledge.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 一切凡愚迷佛方便，執有三乘，不了三界由心所起，不知三世一切佛法自心現量，
translation: All worldlings and foolish people, deluded by the Buddha’s teaching of expedient means, cling to the existence of the three vehicles. They do not understand that the three realms arise from mental states; they do not know all buddha-teach

source_sentence: 見外五塵執為實有，猶如牛羊不能覺知，生死輪中無由出離。
translation: They see the five external objects and cling to them as real existences, just like cattle and sheep that can't perceive them, and there's no way to escape in the wheel of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 佛說諸法無生無滅，亦無三世，何以故？
translation: The Buddha teaches that all things have neither arising nor ceasing, and there are also no three times, so why is that?

source_sentence: 如自心現五塵境界，本無有故；
translation: Just as the self-consciousness manifests five objects, because it does not exist in the first instance.

source_sentence: 有無諸法本不生故，如兔角等；
translation: The dharmas of existence and nonexistence do not arise in the first instance, like the horns of a rabbit.

source_sentence: 聖者自悟境界如是。
translation: The noble person realizes for themselves that the objective realm is like this.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 愚癡凡夫妄起分別，無中執有，有中執無，取阿賴耶種種行相，墮於生滅二種見中，
translation: Foolish worldlings falsely discriminate, clinging to existence in the absence of existence and nonexistence in existence. They grasp the various aspects of the store consciousnesses and fall into the two kinds of views of arising and ceasing

source_sentence: 不了自心而起分別。
translation: They don't understand their own mind and give rise to discrimination.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 當知自心即是一切佛菩薩法，由知自心即佛法故，則能淨一切剎，入一切劫。
translation: You should know that your own mind is the dharmas of all buddhas and bodhisattvas, and because you know that your own mind is the dharmas of buddhas, you can purify all lands and enter all eons.

source_sentence: 是故，善男子！
translation: Therefore, good man!

source_sentence: 應以善法扶助自心，應以法雨潤澤自心，應以妙法治淨自心，應以精進堅固自心，
translation: They should support their own minds with good qualities, nourish their own minds with the rain of truth, purify their own minds with sublime principles, and make their own minds firm by vigorous effort.

source_sentence: 應以忍辱卑下自心，應以禪定清淨自心，應以智慧明利自心，應以佛德發起自心，
translation: You should purify your own mind with patience and humility, purify your own mind with meditation, clarify your own mind with wisdom and insight, and give rise to your own mind based on the virtues of buddhahood.

source_sentence: 應以平等廣博自心，應以十力、四無所畏明照自心。
translation: You should illuminate your own mind with the ten powers and four fearlessnesses.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我唯於此如來甚深無礙莊嚴解脫法門，自在入出；
translation: Only in this profound, unobstructed liberation of the enlightened I enter and emerge freely.

source_sentence: 如諸菩薩摩訶薩住無礙智，行無礙行，於諸境界無不通達，現前常得見一切佛廣大三昧，
translation: “Just as the great enlightening beings who abide in unobstructed knowledge and practice unobstructed action, comprehending all objects without exception, always attain to the vast concentration of seeing all buddhas.

source_sentence: 住一切佛無涅槃際，成正覺門；
translation: They abide in all buddhas’ absence of nirvana, and attain the door of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 普遍了知諸三昧海，所有境界能隨觀察，三世諸法悉皆平等；
translation: They universally know the ocean of concentrations, being able to observe all objects in all their spheres. The things of past, present, and future are all equal.

source_sentence: 分身遍往一切剎海，入於諸佛無分別處，一切境界皆悉現前，常能觀察一切諸法，
translation: They physically traverse all oceans of worlds, entering the buddhas’ spheres without discrimination. All realms appear before them, always able to contemplate all things.

source_sentence: 以圓滿智盡能說行一切菩薩功德行願，於其身中悉能顯現一切世界成壞之相，
translation: With perfect knowledge they can explain the practice of all enlightening beings’ virtuous deeds and vows; in their bodies they can show the signs of becoming and disintegration of all worlds.

source_sentence: 而於自身及彼世界不生二想；
translation: Instead, they do not give rise to two ideas of self and other worlds.

source_sentence: 如是妙行，而我云何能知、能說？
translation: How can I know and explain such a marvelous practice?

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 從此南行閻浮提畔有一住處，名遍無垢；
translation: From here going south to the edge of Jambudvipa, there is a dwelling place called pervading without defilement.

source_sentence: 彼有比丘，名曰海幢。
translation: There was a monk there named Ocean Banner.

source_sentence: 汝詣彼問菩薩云何學菩薩行，修菩薩道。」
translation: Go there and ask the bodhisattva how to train in the bodhisattva practice and cultivate the bodhisattva path.

source_sentence: 時，善財童子禮長者足，右遶觀察，思惟瞻仰，稱揚讚歎無量功德；
translation: Then Sudhana paid his respects to the householder Supratishthita and, venerating him by bowing at his feet, looked around him in all directions.

source_sentence: 念善知識能為救護，於善知識常生歡喜，依善知識發起行願，由善知識令我開悟，
translation: They think of spiritual benefactors as saviors, always rejoicing in spiritual benefactors. Relying on spiritual benefactors to undertake practical undertakings, enlightening beings cause me to be enlightened by means of spiritual benefactor

source_sentence: 敬善知識心無違逆，事善知識無有諂誑，於善知識心常隨順；
translation: Their minds honoring spiritual benefactors without disobedience, serving spiritual benefactors without hypocrisy or deceit; their minds always following spiritual benefactors.

source_sentence: 於善知識起慈母想，令我遠離一切顛倒，於善知識起慈父想，令我成就菩薩善法；
translation: Thinking of spiritual benefactors as mothers, they enable me to get rid of all errors. Thinking of spiritual benefactors as fathers, they enable me to perfect the virtues of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 如是思惟深生愛樂，悲泣流淚辭退而去。
translation: Such thoughts give rise to profound affection and pleasure, weeping in sorrow and tears, withdrew, and departed.

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子一心正念彼長者教，隨順觀察，如說修行；
translation: At that time, Sudhana paid his respects and listened to the instructions of the wealthy merchant. Then Sudhana remembered the words of the great treasury councilor:

source_sentence: 憶持彼不思議菩薩解脫門，思惟彼不思議智慧光明門，深入彼不思議法界次第門，
translation: He remembered those inconceivable doors of liberation of enlightening beings, contemplated those inconceivable doors of light of knowledge, and entered those inconceivable doors of order of the cosmos of reality.

source_sentence: 悟解彼不思議遍入普法門，明見彼不思議如來神變，觀察彼不思議普入佛剎，
translation: Understanding their inconceivable and pervasive entry into all aspects of the Teaching, they clearly saw the mystical displays of those inconceivable buddhas. Observing them inconceivably entering into all buddha-lands

source_sentence: 深信彼不思議佛力莊嚴，照現彼不思議菩薩三昧，了達彼不思議差別世界，
translation: They had faith in the inconceivable arrays of buddhas’ powers, illumined those inconceivable concentrations of enlightening beings, and comprehended those inconceivable worlds of differentiation.

source_sentence: 修集彼不思議菩薩淨業，發起彼不思議廣大誓願。
translation: They cultivate the pure actions of those inconceivable bodhisattvas and give rise to their inconceivable, vast vows.

source_sentence: 如是觀察，漸次南行，向閻浮提畔無垢聚落，周遍尋覓海幢比丘。
translation: In this way he proceeded gradually to the south and headed for the spotless village on the shore of Jambudvipa, where he searched everywhere for the monk Sadāparibhūta.

source_sentence: 乃見處在經行林側，結跏趺坐，端身正念，離出入息，無別思覺，住不思議廣大三昧，
translation: He sat cross-legged, correctly concentrated, with his body straightened and his mind attentive, exhaling and inhaling ceaselessly, without any thought of exhalation or exhalation. He dwelt in the inconceiva

source_sentence: 以三昧力現大神通。
translation: With the power of samādhi, he manifests great supernormal abilities.

source_sentence: 於其身上，從頂至足，一切肢分，一切毛孔，悉現無量不思議數同自身相一切身雲，
translation: On their bodies, from the top of their head to the bottom of their feet, all limbs, and all pores, he manifested countless inconceivable numbers of clouds of all his physical forms, the same as himself.

source_sentence: 遍一切處現一切身：為普供養一切如來故，為普嚴淨一切佛剎故，為普成熟一切菩薩故，
translation: In all places they manifest all bodies, to universally honor all buddhas, to purify all buddha-lands, and to develop all enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 為普調伏一切眾生故，為普濟拔諸苦蘊故，為普除斷三惡趣故，為普開示人天路故，
translation: Because it universally tames all sentient beings, because it universally liberates the aggregate of suffering, because it universally removes the three evil destinies, and because it universally reveals the paths of humans and gods.

source_sentence: 為普銷滅煩惱毒故，為令眾生普入甚深智慧海故，為令眾生究竟安住一切智故。
translation: It's because they universally eliminate the poison of affliction and cause sentient beings to enter the ocean of profound wisdom, and it's because they ultimately abide in omniscience.

source_sentence: 從兩足下出無數佛剎極微塵數長者、居士、婆羅門眾相似身雲，首戴華冠，
translation: From the foot of these feet came clouds of similar bodies of as many great householders and brahmins as atoms in countless buddha-lands, wearing flower crowns on their heads.

source_sentence: 身垂瓔珞，明珠繫頂，被服莊嚴，無量童男以為眷屬；
translation: Their bodies were draped with jewelry, their heads adorned with bright pearls. They had innumerable youthful boys as their retinues.

source_sentence: 普往十方一切世界，悉以一切上妙供具普施眾生。
translation: He traveled to all the worlds in the ten directions and gave all the most sublime offerings to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 所謂：普雨一切上味如法飲食，一切上妙雜色寶華，一切衣服，一切瓔珞，
translation: That is to say, it rains down all the finest flavors of food and drink according to the Teaching, all the finest exquisitely variegated jeweled flowers, all clothing, and all jewelry.

source_sentence: 一切鬘帶，一切熏香，一切塗香，一切寶器，一切宮室，一切欲樂資生之具；
translation: All kinds of jewelry, all kinds of perfumes, all kinds of fragrances, all kinds of ointments, all kinds of precious vessels, all kinds of palaces, and all kinds of necessities for enjoyment

source_sentence: 於一切處救攝一切貧窮眾生，充濟所須，令其滿足；
translation: In all places they rescue and embrace all poor sentient beings, providing them with what they need and causing them to be satisfied.

source_sentence: 安慰一切苦惱眾生，獲身心樂，令其歡喜；
translation: They comfort all sentient beings in distress, enabling them to attain physical and mental bliss.

source_sentence: 成熟一切善根眾生，心意調柔，令其清淨，究竟無上菩提之道；
translation: They mature all sentient beings with roots of goodness, their minds and thoughts tempered, causing them to be pure, ultimately following the unexcelled path of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 如是示現充滿十方。
translation: Thus, it's shown to fill the ten directions.

source_sentence: 從其兩膝出現無數百千萬億諸剎帝利及婆羅門并其眷屬相似身雲，皆悉聰慧，
translation: From his knees emerged countless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of buddha-like bodies of kṣatriyas, brāhmaṇas, and their retinues, all endowed with wisdom.

source_sentence: 具諸藝業，世出世間無不通達，種種色相，種種形貌，種種衣服，上妙莊嚴，
translation: They are endowed with all kinds of arts and crafts, knowable both mundane and transmundane; they have various forms, various features, various bodies, various clothes, supremely beautiful adornments.

source_sentence: 普遍十方一切世界，恒以四攝攝諸眾生。
translation: They pervade all worlds in the ten directions, always taking care of sentient beings with the four means of containment.

source_sentence: 謂：與財寶令其富樂，可意語言令聞歡喜，或以同事勸導誘進；
translation: They are: giving property and possessions to enable them to be rich and happy; agreeable speech to delight those who hear it; or co-workers’ encouragement and guidance to induce progress.

source_sentence: 如是一切貧者令足，病者令愈，危者令安，怖者令止，有憂苦者令其快樂。
translation: Thus, he causes all the poor to be satisfied, the sick to be cured, the dangerous to be made at ease, the fearful to be stopped, and the grieved to be made happy.

source_sentence: 復以方便咸使發心，授以正法，令其開悟，速疾令其離諸不善，集眾善法，
translation: They also develop the aspiration for enlightenment by means of skillful means, and teach them the true teaching so that they will awaken to enlightenment. They quickly get rid of unwholesomeness and accumulate wholesome states.

source_sentence: 從生死泥拔濟令出，住真實義無畏法中，如是示現充滿十方。
translation: He pulls them out of the mud of birth-and-death and makes them emerge, abides in the true teaching of fearlessness, and thus manifests to fill the ten directions.

source_sentence: 從其臍輪出等眾生數異道諸仙相似身雲，種種形相，各別莊嚴，或服草衣，
translation: From the navel circle emerged clouds of similar bodies of various sages from different realms of rebirth, equal to the number of sentient beings there. They each adorned themselves in various forms, some wearing grass-covered robes

source_sentence: 或衣樹皮，皆執澡瓶，威儀寂靜。
translation: Some of them wore robes made of bark, all carrying water bottles. Their manner was quiet and peaceful.

source_sentence: 將諸仙眾，足步虛空，往返周旋十方世界，咸出無量歌讚之聲，稱揚諸佛所有功德，
translation: The holy ones circled the worlds of the ten directions with their feet in space, producing countless sounds of singing and praising the virtues of all buddhas.

source_sentence: 或歎菩薩所修梵行，所說妙法，所證清淨，其音和雅，美妙清徹，普聞十方，
translation: Or they may praise the practice of purity cultivated by enlightening beings, the sublime teachings expounded by enlightening beings, and the purity realized by enlightening beings. Their voices are harmonious, subtle, beautiful

source_sentence: 無有障礙，調伏成熟一切眾生，普攝諸根，不令放逸，令其觀察真實境界；
translation: Unhindered, they tame and develop all sentient beings. They embrace all faculties without heedlessness, enabling them to contemplate the realm of reality.

source_sentence: 或說諸法皆無自性，使其發起一切智心，令其安住究竟實道；
translation: Some they teach that all things have no self-nature, causing them to give rise to the determination for omniscience and to abide on the ultimate path.

source_sentence: 或說世間資生言論；
translation: Some I elucidate by discussing worldly necessities.

source_sentence: 或現方域導俗軌儀；
translation: Or they may show the ways and manners of worldly instruction in various countries.

source_sentence: 種種善巧，隨宜化度。
translation: Various kinds of skillful means are taught and liberated as appropriate.

source_sentence: 開一切智出要法門，令諸眾生普得饒益，隨其次第各修其業，如是示現，
translation: He opens the door of all knowledge to the essential teachings, enabling sentient beings to attain universal benefit; cultivating each practice in order according to their actions, he shows it thus.

source_sentence: 充滿十方。
translation: It fills the ten directions.

source_sentence: 從其兩脇出不思議無數龍王、龍子、龍女并其眷屬相似身雲，現不思議諸龍神變，
translation: From their two sides emerged inconceivable clouds of countless similar bodies of dragon kings, nāga sons, nāga daughters, and their retinues, manifesting inconceivable mystical displays of the various drag

source_sentence: 遍滿虛空。
translation: It pervades space.

source_sentence: 所謂：雨不思議寶香莊嚴雲，不思議寶華莊嚴雲，不思議寶鬘莊嚴雲，
translation: It rained clouds of inconceivable arrays of jewel fragrances, clouds of inconceivable arrays of jewel flowers, and clouds of inconceivable arrays of jewel garlands.

source_sentence: 不思議寶蓋莊嚴雲，不思議寶幢莊嚴雲，不思議寶幡莊嚴雲，不思議種種妙寶瓔珞莊嚴雲，
translation: Inconceivable clouds adorned with jewel canopies, inconceivable clouds adorned with jewel banners, inconceivable clouds adorned with jewel pennants, and inconceivable clouds adorned with

source_sentence: 不思議大摩尼寶王莊嚴雲，不思議種種寶座莊嚴雲，不思議天寶嚴具莊嚴雲，
translation: Inconceivable clouds of adornments of great jewel kings, inconceivable clouds of arrays of various jewel thrones, and inconceivable clouds of adornments of celestial jewel ornaments.

source_sentence: 不思議天寶宮殿莊嚴雲，不思議諸天、采女歌詠讚歎莊嚴雲，不思議天寶珠網莊嚴雲，
translation: Inconceivable clouds of adornments of celestial jewel palaces, inconceivable clouds of adornments with goddesses and goddesses singing hymns of praise, inconceivable clouds of ador

source_sentence: 不思議摩尼鬚葉臺蕊寶蓮華莊嚴雲，不思議一切摩尼寶冠莊嚴雲，不思議無邊光焰天寶莊嚴雲，
translation: Inconceivable were the clouds of adornments of jewel beads, leaves, lotus blossoms, and flower garlands; inconceivable were the clouds of adornments of all kinds of jewel cro

source_sentence: 不思議華鬘幢蓋天身莊嚴雲，不思議恭敬合掌諸天采女雲，不思議含輝吐焰金色蓮華雲，
translation: Inconceivable are the clouds of adornments of flower garlands, banners, canopies, and celestial bodies; inconceivable are the clouds of reverence joining their palms to heavenly maidens; in

source_sentence: 不思議演說一切諸佛功德大音聲雲；
translation: Inconceivable are the clouds of great sounds of the virtues of all buddhas’ teachings.

source_sentence: 如是一切普遍虛空，以為莊嚴，周遍十方一切世界諸佛道場而為供養。
translation: Thus, all of these universally pervade space as adornments and are offered to the buddha-practice sites of enlightenment in all the worlds of the ten directions.

source_sentence: 普令眾生皆生歡喜，除煩惱熱，得清涼樂，如是示現充滿十方。
translation: He causes all sentient beings to become joyous, rids themselves of the fever of affliction, attains purity and coolness, and thus manifests to fill the ten directions.

source_sentence: 從其胸臆吉祥相中出無數佛剎極微塵數阿脩羅王并其眷屬相似身雲，皆悉示現不可思議巧幻術力，
translation: From the auspicious features of their chests emerge countless clouds of bodies resembling buddha-lands, as numerous as atoms in all buddha-lands, similar to those of the asura kings and their retinues. They all manifested

source_sentence: 種種神變充滿虛空。
translation: Various miraculous transformations fill space.

source_sentence: 所謂：能令無量百千萬億世界皆悉震動，一切山王互相衝擊，一切海水皆大涌沸，
translation: They can cause countless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of worlds to shake, all the kings of mountains to shake each other, and all the waters of the oceans to boil greatly.

source_sentence: 諸天宮殿無不動搖，諸魔光明無不隱蔽，諸魔軍眾無不摧伏；
translation: The celestial palaces were not shaken, the lights of the devils were not hidden, and all the armies of demons did not fail to vanquish them.

source_sentence: 普令眾生捨離憍慢，心無放逸，除慳嫉垢，息諸怨害，咸起慈心，破煩惱山，
translation: Causing all sentient beings to abandon conceit and arrogance, their minds not indulging in laziness, getting rid of the stain of stinginess and jealousy, extinguishing enemies, they all become compassionate

source_sentence: 竭愛欲海，長無鬪諍，永共和善。
translation: They are free from the sea of craving and desire, have no quarrels for a long time, and always be harmonious together.

source_sentence: 復以幻力遊戲神通，開悟群生令離貪著，於諸惡法常樂遠離，怖畏生死，
translation: By means of their magical powers and mystic abilities, they also enlighten sentient beings and cause them to be freed from craving. They are always delighted with avoiding evil things and fearful of birth and death.

source_sentence: 欣求解脫；
translation: They delight in seeking liberation.

source_sentence: 令出世間一切諸趣，令住無上菩提之心，令修菩薩清淨妙行，令趣菩薩波羅蜜道，
translation: “Great enlightening beings of the ten directions cause all sentient beings to be liberated from all mundane states, to abide in the supreme determination for enlightenment, to cultivate pure and subtle practices of enlightening

source_sentence: 令入一切諸菩薩地，令照菩薩微妙法門，令觀菩薩方便善巧。
translation: He causes them to enter all the bodhisattva stages, illuminates the subtle dharmas of enlightening beings, and observes the skillful means of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 如是示現遍周法界。
translation: Thus, it's shown to pervade the Dharma realm.

source_sentence: 從其背出無量阿僧祇佛剎極微塵數聲聞、獨覺相似身雲，為諸眾生應以二乘而受化者廣說法要，
translation: From his back emerged as many clouds of bodies resembling śrāvakas and pratyekbuddhas as atoms in countless buddha-lands, teaching the Dharma extensively to sentient beings who should be taught by the two vehicles.

source_sentence: 令其調伏。
translation: He causes them to be disciplined.

source_sentence: 所謂：為執我者說無有我，為執常者說行無常，為貪行者說不淨觀，為瞋行者說慈心觀，
translation: To those who cling to self they teach that there is no self; to those who cling to permanence they teach that conditioned states of being are impermanent; to those who practice covetousness they teach the contemplation of impurity; to those who

source_sentence: 為癡行者說緣起觀，為等分者說與智慧相應境界；
translation: He teaches the contemplation of interdependent origination for the practitioners of delusion, and he teaches the sphere associated with wisdom for the equanimous.

source_sentence: 各別對治，令遍觀察。
translation: Each has a specific antidote that causes pervasive observation.

source_sentence: 為於境界生樂著者，說離諸著無所有性，為遍耽滯五欲境界，說離諸欲無染著性，
translation: To those who give rise to pleasant attachments in regard to objects, he teaches that freedom from attachment has no essence. To those who are completely attached to the realm of desire, he teaches that freedom from desire is without defiled attachment

source_sentence: 為著寂靜定所繫者，說大願門，令深愛樂。
translation: To those who are bound by the concentration of quiescence, he teaches the great vow aspect so that they'll deeply love it.

source_sentence: 誓普饒益一切眾生，轉於法輪；
translation: They vow to benefit all sentient beings, turning the wheel of teaching.

source_sentence: 盡未來際，令諸眾生所願皆滿，如是遍周一切法界。
translation: To the end of time, they cause all sentient beings to fulfill their wishes, thus pervading all the Dharma realm.

source_sentence: 從其兩肩出阿僧祇佛剎極微塵數夜叉、羅剎王種種形貌，種種色相，長短廣狹，
translation: From their shoulders emerge as many such yakṣas and rākṣasa kings as atoms in countless buddha-lands, with various forms, various colors, long, short, wide, and narrow.

source_sentence: 種種儀容，威勢雄猛，甚可怖畏，無量眷屬而自圍遶。
translation: They are endowed with various appearances and mighty powers, terrifyingly fearsome, surrounded by innumerable retinues.

source_sentence: 現種種神力，吼種種大聲，隨其所應，作種種方便，遍滿十方一切世界，
translation: Manifesting various spiritual powers, they roar various great sounds, according to their capacities, and perform various means to fill all worlds in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 守護一切善行眾生及諸賢聖、菩薩眾會說法道場。
translation: They guard all well-practicing sentient beings and the assemblies of good men, sages, and bodhisattvas at the enlightenment site to teach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 諸有受持菩薩淨行，欣求如來一切正智，若向正住及正住者，或時現作執金剛神，
translation: Those who receive and uphold the pure practices of enlightening beings delight in seeking all the true knowledge of buddhas. And those who are directed toward righteousness and rightly abiding, sometimes they manifest themselves as adamantine guardian spirits

source_sentence: 守護諸佛，承事供養及佛住處；
translation: They guard the buddhas, serving and honoring them as well as their abodes.

source_sentence: 或遍守護一切世間，令其不入一切惡道。
translation: Or they may guard all worlds everywhere, preventing them from entering all bad destinies.

source_sentence: 有恐怖者令得安隱，有疾病者令得除差，在厄難者令除苦惱，有過惡者令自厭悔，
translation: He causes those with fear to attain peace, those with illness to be cured, those in distress to be relieved of suffering, and those who have faults to repent.

source_sentence: 有災橫者令其息滅。
translation: If there's a disaster, he causes it to cease.

source_sentence: 積集福智大心眾生，令其能轉諸佛法輪，捨生死輪，住正法輪，摧滅一切異道邪論，
translation: “Great enlightening beings develop sentient beings of great minds who have accumulated virtue and knowledge so that they can turn the wheel of teaching of buddhas, abandon the wheel of birth and death and abide in the right wheel of teaching, thereby

source_sentence: 如是利益，遍滿十方一切法界。
translation: Such benefits pervade all the Dharma realms in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 從其腹出無量百千阿僧祇佛剎極微塵數緊那羅王，各與無數百千萬億緊那羅女眷屬圍遶，
translation: From their belly came forth countless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of buddha-lands, each surrounded by as many kings of the kiṃnaras as atoms in infinite buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 無量佛剎極微塵數乾闥婆王，各與無數百千萬億乾闥婆女眷屬圍遶。
translation: The king of the gandharvas, as numerous as atoms in infinite buddha-lands, was surrounded by countless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of queens and their retinues.

source_sentence: 各奏無數阿僧祇百千天樂，歌詠讚歎一切諸法緣生實性，歌詠讚歎一切諸佛難思功德，
translation: Each played countless hundreds of thousands of celestial instruments, singing and praising the true nature of all dharmas that arise by conditions, and singing and praising the inconceivable virtues of all buddhas.

source_sentence: 歌詠讚歎發菩提心普遍威力，歌詠讚歎一切菩薩修圓滿行，歌詠讚歎一切諸佛成正覺門，
translation: singing praises of the universal power of the determination for enlightenment, singing praises of the cultivation of perfect practice by all enlightening beings, and singing praises of the attainment of enlightenment by all buddhas.

source_sentence: 歌詠讚歎一切諸佛轉法輪門，歌詠讚歎一切諸佛現神變門，歌詠讚歎一切諸佛般涅槃門，
translation: They sang in praise of all buddhas turning the wheel of teaching; they sang in praise of all buddhas manifesting miraculous signs; they sang in praise of all buddhas entering nirvana.

source_sentence: 歌詠讚歎守護一切諸佛教門，歌詠讚歎令諸眾生皆歡喜門；
translation: They sing and praise the gate of protecting all aspects of enlightenment, and they sing and praise the gate of causing sentient beings to rejoice.

source_sentence: 開示演說嚴淨一切諸佛剎門，開示演說一切諸佛微妙法門，開示演說照一切法無障礙門，
translation: They show and explain the adornment of all buddha-lands; they show and explain the subtle teachings of all buddhas; they show and explain the unobstructed illumination of all truths.

source_sentence: 開示演說發起一切諸善根門；
translation: “Great enlightening beings develop all kinds of roots of goodness by means of various practices.

source_sentence: 如是利益充滿十方。
translation: Such benefits fill the ten directions.

source_sentence: 從其面門出無量百千阿僧祇佛剎極微塵數轉輪聖王，七寶具足，四兵圍遶，
translation: From the pore of his face emerged countless hundreds of thousands of buddha-lands, as many wheel-turning sage kings as atoms in the polar mountain. Endowed with the seven kinds of treasure, they were surrounded by

source_sentence: 放大捨光，雨無盡寶最勝摩尼，莊嚴世界，普施眾生，咸令充足，令斷十惡，
translation: They emanated great rays of light, showering rain of inexhaustible jewels, the finest jewels. Adorning all worlds, they gave to sentient beings everywhere, enabling them to satisfy themselves and cut off the

source_sentence: 修行十善。
translation: He cultivates the ten good qualities.

source_sentence: 所謂：一切屠獵、漁捕、暴惡眾生令起慈悲，不斷生命；
translation: All kindly compassionate sentient beings who are slaughtered, hunted, fished, captured, and violent—they do not give up life.

source_sentence: 貧乏苦惱下劣眾生，令其永捨不與取行，常行惠施，能捨無量百千萬億端正采女，
translation: He causes the poor, suffering, and inferior sentient beings to permanently abandon their practice of taking what is not given. Always practicing charity, he can give up measureless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of beautiful women.

source_sentence: 心無吝惜；
translation: Their minds are not stingy or greedy.

source_sentence: 令諸眾生永斷邪婬，修持梵行；
translation: They cause all sentient beings to forever cut off wickedness and cultivate the practice of austerity.

source_sentence: 虛誑眾生，令其究竟常真實語，不作虛誑無益談說；
translation: They deceive sentient beings, enabling them to ultimately always speak truthfully; they do not engage in false speech or useless talk.

source_sentence: 令攝他語，不行離間，常樂和合，無有乖諍；
translation: They cause others’ words to be collected; they do not act in seclusion. They are always happy and harmonious, without any dispute or controversy.

source_sentence: 令柔軟語，無有麁惡；
translation: He caused them to speak softly and gently, without anger or malice.

source_sentence: 雜穢語者，令常演說甚深決定明了之義，順佛法語，利益修行，永斷綺飾無義言辭，
translation: A defiled speech is that which causes people to always expound profound, definitive and clear meanings. In harmony with the Buddha’s words of teaching, it benefits practitioners and enables them to permanently eliminate fancy, useless

source_sentence: 令諸眾生深入法句；
translation: They cause sentient beings to enter deeply into the teaching.

source_sentence: 多貪欲者，令其少欲，修習知足最勝端嚴無生正行；
translation: Those with many cravings cause them to have few desires and cultivate the supremely sublime, unarisen right practice of contentment.

source_sentence: 多怒害者令除瞋恚，於諸眾生恒起慈心，心無瑕垢，為說大悲，歡喜攝受，
translation: “Great enlightening beings develop compassion toward sentient beings, causing them to be freed from anger and hatred. Their minds are not tainted with defilement but they speak of great compassion for the sake of sentient being

source_sentence: 令入佛法；
translation: They cause them to enter the buddha-dharma.

source_sentence: 墮見網者為說實義，令觀諸法，深入因緣，善明諦理，決擇正邪，令心清淨，
translation: To those who have fallen into the web of views he teaches the true doctrine, enabling them to contemplate all things and enter deeply into causes and conditions. He clearly understands truth and principle, discerning right and wrong, thereby purifying their

source_sentence: 拔邪見刺，破疑惑山；
translation: They pull out the thorns of wrong views and break through the mountain of doubt.

source_sentence: 令諸眾生悟心實性，具足通達，趣入甚深，一切障礙悉皆除滅；
translation: “Great enlightening beings cause sentient beings to awaken to the true nature of mind, fully comprehending it. Entering into great depth, they remove all obstructions and all hindrances.

source_sentence: 如是所作充滿法界。
translation: Thus, what they do fills the Dharma realm.

source_sentence: 從其兩目出無量百千阿僧祇佛剎極微塵數廣大日輪，放大光明普照一切諸大地獄，
translation: From those two eyes emerged infinite hundreds of thousands of buddha-lands, as numerous as atoms in countless buddha-lands, emanating great rays of light illuminating all the great hells.

source_sentence: 所有苦惱悉令除滅；
translation: He caused all the pains and afflictions to cease.

source_sentence: 又照一切世界中間，令除黑闇，覩見光明；
translation: He also illumined the middle of all worlds, removing darkness and obscuring light.

source_sentence: 又照一切十方世界餓鬼傍生，令其捨離愚癡翳障，得大智慧，拔除眾苦。
translation: It also illumines all the worlds of the ten directions with hungry ghosts and animals, enabling them to abandon the hindrances of folly and ignorance, attain great wisdom, and remove all suffering.

source_sentence: 復於一切垢濁世界放清淨光，白銀世界放黃金光，黃金世界放白銀光；
translation: They also radiated pure light in all the worlds of defilement, golden light in the realm of white silver, and silver light in the realm of gold.

source_sentence: 瑠璃世界放玻瓈光，玻瓈世界放瑠璃光；
translation: The lapis lazuli world radiates crystal light, and the crystal world radiates lapis lazuli light.

source_sentence: 硨磲世界放碼碯光，碼碯世界放硨磲光；
translation: The coarse world emits the light of a code, and the coarse world emits the light of a code.

source_sentence: 赤珠世界放日藏摩尼王光，日藏摩尼王世界放赤珠光；
translation: The world Red Jewel radiated the light of the sun-treasure maṇi king, and the world Sun-treasure maṇi king radiated the light of the red jewel.

source_sentence: 帝青世界放月藏焰網摩尼寶王光，月藏焰網摩尼寶王世界放帝青光；
translation: The world Tejaprabhā world radiated the light of the jewel king Jewel King Net of the Moon Treasury, and the world Jewel King Net of the Moon Treasury radiated the light of the tejaprabhā world.

source_sentence: 純寶所成世界放雜寶光，雜寶所成世界放純寶光。
translation: The world made of pure treasures radiates the light of mixed treasures, and the world made of mixed treasures radiates the light of pure treasures.

source_sentence: 如是光明普照佛剎道場眾會而作佛事，照諸眾生心之稠林，辦諸眾生無量事業，
translation: Such light illumines all the assemblies at the sites of enlightenment in buddha-lands and accomplishes buddha-works. It illumines the dense forest of minds of sentient beings and develops measureless undertakings for

source_sentence: 嚴飾一切世間境界，令諸眾生心得清涼，生大歡喜，安隱快樂；
translation: They adorn all worldly realms, enabling sentient beings to attain purity of mind and give rise to great joy and peace and happiness.

source_sentence: 如是所作充滿法界。
translation: Thus, what they do fills the Dharma realm.
